name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】 Through the Curious Tune - Anya Melfissa 2025 Birthday Live 生誕祭ライブ #CuriousTune3D [FXLKbTnMP2M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Anya Melfissa continues her MC section, announcing card game bonuses and a new MV release.
Transition scene with a large clock striking midnight, accompanied by bell tolls.
Anya Melfissa performs her new original song 'CHRONIC'.

subtitles.original: ...of your face.
subtitles.english: ...of your face.

subtitles.original: Kartu ini itu oshi holo-mem-card gitu guys.
subtitles.english: This card is like an 'oshi holo-mem' card, guys.

subtitles.original: For details about the card and how to play, please check the website.
subtitles.english: For details about the card and how to play, please check the website.

subtitles.english: will have its premiere today at 10:00 PM, so please look forward to it.
